price: i darovali smo mu milošću Našom kao vjerovjesnika brata njegova Haruna.
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥ مِن رَّحۡمَتِنَآ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ نَبِيّٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lahu min raḥmatinā akhāhu hārūna nabiyyan
